price: ili da ih neće na putovanjima njihovim kazniti – oni neće umaći,
arabic: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِي تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: aw yakhudhahum fī taqallubihim famā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
